mapper.select: SELECT qna_no qnaNo, member_nickname memberNickname, qna_category qnaCategory, qna_title qnaTitle, qna_content qnaContent, create_date, update_date FROM qna WHERE qna_no = #{qnaNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna( member_nickname, qna_category, qna_title, qna_content, qna_secret, update_date, create_date ) VALUES( #{memberNickname}, #{qnaCategory}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaSecret}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET qna_categoty = #{qnaCategory}, qna_title = #{qnaTitle}, qna_content = #{qnaContent}, update_date = NOW() WHERE qna_no = #{qnaNo} AND member_nickname = #{memberNickname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_image( qna_no, qna_image_name, qna_image_ext, qna_image_size ) VALUES ( #{qnaNo}, #{qnaImgName}, #{qnaImgExt}, #{qnaImgSize} )
